column4: Hello could someone suggest me an easy way to make a backup in ubuntu? programs with gui are appreciated
For a gui, gksudo nautilus then go to /, ctrl-a to select all, right click and create archive (just make a tar, compressing it would take ages)
what about some folders in /home that can't be copied with this command?
I am not sure how that would handle multiple filesystems if you have a seperate /home
